title: Does the riot automated chat system scan for the word dog?
body:
Since the word dog is used so often to insult others, I'm wondering is this neutral word now considered toxic by the riot machines?
I'm getting paranoid here.

replies.body: I don’t think I’ve ever seen dog used to insult someone, dawg. But still, think the answer is no.

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7mUz88BF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-08T02:09:19.967+0000)
>
> I don’t think I’ve ever seen dog used to insult someone, dawg. But still, think the answer is no.

I think its more a foreign thing. (Well, foreign if youre from USA)

> [{quoted}](name=Tele II,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7mUz88BF,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-10-08T02:18:20.461+0000)
>
> I think its more a foreign thing. (Well, foreign if youre from USA)

Oh that is right. Kinda like "your mom" in some regions, I would think.
i see "dog shit" all the time im starting to get paranoid i need an official answer

there's a difference between dog and dog shit

there's also a difference between saying "dog" during a conversation that seems to be of negative connotation and something like "oh shit! my dog just peed the carpet brb"

the bot can usually understand context

Why are you gettin paranoid if you are not the one writing it?

Ps.: You probably wont get an official answer here, Rioters do not give 2 dogshit about this board, and let the Rito worshippers to clean up everything what would disagree with them.

> [{quoted}](name=Ph03n1xb1rd,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7mUz88BF,comment-id=00000000000000000001,timestamp=2019-10-09T14:02:23.904+0000)
>
> Why are you gettin paranoid if you are not the one writing it?
> 
> Ps.: You probably wont get an official answer here, Rioters do not give 2 dogshit about this board, and let the Rito worshippers to clean up everything what would disagree with them.

im so close to honor 5 because i know how their system works, and typing the word "dog" could mean that i never get honor 5 for this season

Well, i think that if you write it as an insult, you are good, because even if you would get punished for it, they would revert it after you submit a ticket.

But the easiest way to get honor 5 is to not use chat at all.

GL HF reaching it!

It’s a Asian thing. I was on OCE for 6 years and was called dog 100s of times and it got to the point that I could tell people’s backgrounds just from there insults. Oh, And dog means the B word to them.
Considering they have canine-based skins, I don't think dog is picked up as auto toxic.

> [{quoted}](name=AJStarhiker,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7mUz88BF,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-10-12T17:36:27.504+0000)
>
> Considering they have canine-based skins, I don't think dog is picked up as auto toxic.

but a question is how they release dog skins in turkey if the word dog is so offensive in turkey

If you call people dog as an insult, expect the IFS to be able to pick that up and flag it as negative.

If you talk about dogs during the game, expect the IFS to be able to pick that up and flag it as spam (punishable), neutral chatter (not punishable), or team bonding (also not punishable), depending on how you use it.
Even the automated filter takes context into account to some degree, and i cant say i have ever seen that used as an insult..
